name: output cords
description: cords that runs from the back of a system to a display device

name: other input devices
description: any device (not of the standard controller variety) used for making game input, such as a microphone or game instrument

name: storage device
description: devices that provide storage for game or save data

name: performance enhancers
description: devices that enable better system performance, such as RAM extenders

name: adapters
description: devices which allow input or output not natively supported by systems

name: game modifiers
description: devices which boot games with traditionally unavailable options included, such as Game Shark or Action Replay

name: power suppliers
description: items used to provide a standard, alternative, or backup source of power

name: on-device screens
description: screens which attach directly to systems, making play possible without a TV or monitor

name: material output devices
description: devices which output real-world items such as photo prints
